p: Gariglio et al. [ 30] showed that in broiler ducks fed 3, 6 and 9% of HI larva meal, in substitution of gluten meal, the CTTAD of CP decreased during the starter period and the lowest CP value was registered for the inclusion of 9% HI. However, the CTTAD of EE increased with increasing HI inclusion levels during the grower and finisher periods [ 30].
